level.heading: Immunity.
level.text: There shall be no liability on the part of, and no cause of action shall arise against, the Commissioner or the Department of Insurance, Securities, and Banking or its employees or agents for any action taken by them in the performance of their powers and duties under this chapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-166 substituted "Department of Insurance, Securities, and Banking" for "Department of Insurance and Securities Regulation".

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 4(l)(3) of Consolidation of Financial Services Emergency Amendment Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-381, February 27, 2004, 51 DCR 2653).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-233
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-233, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-2001.
